articles.title: Stone tool discovery challenges entire theory of human evolution - Earth.com
articles.description: Recent stone tool discoveries are prompting a reassessment of the cultural evolution of Homo sapiens around 50,000 to 40,000 years ago.
articles.content:
Recent stone tool discoveries are prompting a reassessment of the cultural evolution of Homo sapiens during their spread across Eurasia around 50,000 to 40,000 years ago.
